content.json: **NOTE**: This workbook depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**Cloudflare**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-CloudflareDataConnector-parse) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

content.query:
Cloudflare
| summarize count() by ClientDeviceType
content.title: Traffic Type

content.query:
Cloudflare
| summarize count() by ClientRequestProtocol
content.title: HTTP Protocols

content.query:
Cloudflare
| summarize count() by ClientRequestMethod
content.title: Request Methods

content.query:
Cloudflare
| extend EdgeResponseContentType = iif(isempty(EdgeResponseContentType),"empty",EdgeResponseContentType )
| summarize count() by EdgeResponseContentType
content.title: Content Types

content.query:
Cloudflare
| summarize Count=count() by ClientRequestURI
| sort by Count | project-rename ClientRequestURI=ClientRequestURI | take 50
content.title: Top Requested URIs

content.query:
Cloudflare
| summarize Count=count() by ClientIP
| sort by Count | take 50 | project-rename  ClientIP=ClientIP
content.title: Top Traffic IPs

content.query:
Cloudflare
| extend ClientRequestReferer = iif(isempty(ClientRequestReferer),"empty",ClientRequestReferer )
| summarize Count=count() by ClientRequestReferer
| sort by Count | take 50
content.title: Top Referer

content.query:
Cloudflare
| summarize Count=count() by ClientIPClass | project-rename ClientIPClass=ClientIPClass
| sort by Count | take 50
content.title: Top Traffic Types

content.query:
Cloudflare
| summarize Count=count() by ClientRequestUserAgent | project-rename ClientRequestUserAgent=ClientRequestUserAgent
| sort by Count | take 50
content.title: Top User Agents

content.query:
Cloudflare
| extend threat=case(EdgePathingSrc =="user" and EdgePathingOp == "ban" and EdgePathingStatus has "ip" ,"IP Block",EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ctry","Country Block",EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="zl", "Routed by Zone Lockdown", EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ua", "Blocked User Agent", EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="rateLimit", "Blocked by Rate Limiting", EdgePathingSrc=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="unknown", "Blocked by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp=="chl", "Challenged by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc=="bic" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="unknown", "Browser Integrity Check", EdgePathingSrc=="hot" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ctry", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc=="hot" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ip", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaErr", "CAPTCHA Error", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaFail", "CAPTCHA Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaNew", "New CAPTCHA", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlErr", "Java Script Challenge Error", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlFail", "Java Script Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlNew", "New Java Script Challenge", EdgePathingSrc=="protect" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="17ddos", "L7 DDos Mitigation","")
| where isnotempty(threat)
| summarize Count=count() by threat
content.title: Top Threats
Requests vs Threats

content.query:
Cloudflare
| extend threat=case(EdgePathingSrc =="user" and EdgePathingOp == "ban" and EdgePathingStatus has "ip" ,"IP Block",EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ctry","Country Block",EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="zl", "Routed by Zone Lockdown", EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ua", "Blocked User Agent", EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="rateLimit", "Blocked by Rate Limiting", EdgePathingSrc=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="unknown", "Blocked by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp=="chl", "Challenged by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc=="bic" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="unknown", "Browser Integrity Check", EdgePathingSrc=="hot" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ctry", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc=="hot" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ip", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaErr", "CAPTCHA Error", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaFail", "CAPTCHA Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaNew", "New CAPTCHA", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlErr", "Java Script Challenge Error", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlFail", "Java Script Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlNew", "New Java Script Challenge", EdgePathingSrc=="protect" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="17ddos", "L7 DDos Mitigation","")
| where isnotempty(threat)
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain};
content.title: Threats Over Time

content.query:
Cloudflare
| extend threat=case(EdgePathingSrc =="user" and EdgePathingOp == "ban" and EdgePathingStatus has "ip" ,"IP Block",EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ctry","Country Block",EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="zl", "Routed by Zone Lockdown", EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ua", "Blocked User Agent", EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="rateLimit", "Blocked by Rate Limiting", EdgePathingSrc=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="unknown", "Blocked by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp=="chl", "Challenged by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc=="bic" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="unknown", "Browser Integrity Check", EdgePathingSrc=="hot" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ctry", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc=="hot" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ip", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaErr", "CAPTCHA Error", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaFail", "CAPTCHA Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaNew", "New CAPTCHA", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlErr", "Java Script Challenge Error", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlFail", "Java Script Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlNew", "New Java Script Challenge", EdgePathingSrc=="protect" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="17ddos", "L7 DDos Mitigation","")
| where isnotempty(threat)
| summarize count() by ClientCountry | project-rename Country=ClientCountry | take 20
content.title: Top Threat Countries

Cloudflare
| extend threat=case(EdgePathingSrc =="user" and EdgePathingOp == "ban" and EdgePathingStatus has "ip" ,"IP Block",EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ctry","Country Block",EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="zl", "Routed by Zone Lockdown", EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ua", "Blocked User Agent", EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="rateLimit", "Blocked by Rate Limiting", EdgePathingSrc=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="unknown", "Blocked by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp=="chl", "Challenged by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc=="bic" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="unknown", "Browser Integrity Check", EdgePathingSrc=="hot" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ctry", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc=="hot" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ip", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaErr", "CAPTCHA Error", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaFail", "CAPTCHA Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaNew", "New CAPTCHA", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlErr", "Java Script Challenge Error", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlFail", "Java Script Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlNew", "New Java Script Challenge", EdgePathingSrc=="protect" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="17ddos", "L7 DDos Mitigation","")

Cloudflare
| extend threat=case(EdgePathingSrc =="user" and EdgePathingOp == "ban" and EdgePathingStatus has "ip" ,"IP Block",EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ctry","Country Block",EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="zl", "Routed by Zone Lockdown", EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ua", "Blocked User Agent", EdgePathingSrc=="user" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="rateLimit", "Blocked by Rate Limiting", EdgePathingSrc=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="unknown", "Blocked by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp=="chl", "Challenged by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc=="bic" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="unknown", "Browser Integrity Check", EdgePathingSrc=="hot" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ctry", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc=="hot" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="ip", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaErr", "CAPTCHA Error", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaFail", "CAPTCHA Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="captchaNew", "New CAPTCHA", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlErr", "Java Script Challenge Error", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlFail", "Java Script Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc=="macro" and EdgePathingOp=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus=="jschlNew", "New Java Script Challenge", EdgePathingSrc=="protect" and EdgePathingOp=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus=="17ddos", "L7 DDos Mitigation","")

content.query:
let 5xx = Cloudflare
| where tostring(EdgeResponseStatus) startswith "5"
| summarize Count=count()
| extend title="5xx Errors (Edge)";

let 4xx = Cloudflare
| where tostring(EdgeResponseStatus) startswith "4"
| summarize Count=count()
| extend title="4xx Errors (Edge)";

let 3xx = Cloudflare
| where tostring(EdgeResponseStatus) startswith "3"
| summarize Count=count()
| extend title="3xx Errors (Edge)";

let result_table = union 5xx, 4xx, 3xx; 
result_table 
| sort by Count
content.title: ERRORS Counts (Edge)

content.query:
Cloudflare
| extend response_error_type= case(tostring(EdgeResponseStatus) startswith "2" , "2xx", tostring(EdgeResponseStatus) startswith "3" , "3xx", tostring(EdgeResponseStatus) startswith "4" , "4xx", tostring(EdgeResponseStatus) startswith "5" , "5xx","")
| where isnotempty(response_error_type)
| summarize Count=count() by response_error_type
content.title: Edge Response Error Ratio

content.query:
Cloudflare
| extend response_error_type= case(tostring(OriginResponseStatus) startswith "2" , "2xx", tostring(OriginResponseStatus) startswith "3" , "3xx", tostring(OriginResponseStatus) startswith "4" , "4xx", tostring(OriginResponseStatus) startswith "5" , "5xx","")
| where isnotempty(response_error_type)
| summarize Count=count() by response_error_type
content.title: Origin Response Error Ratio

content.query:
Cloudflare
| extend response_error_type= case(tostring(EdgeResponseStatus) startswith "2" , "2xx", tostring(EdgeResponseStatus) startswith "3" , "3xx", tostring(EdgeResponseStatus) startswith "4" , "4xx", tostring(EdgeResponseStatus) startswith "5" , "5xx","")
| where isnotempty(response_error_type)
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by response_error_type;
content.title: Edge Response Status Over Time

content.query:
Cloudflare
| extend response_error_type= case(tostring(OriginResponseStatus) startswith "2" , "2xx", tostring(OriginResponseStatus) startswith "3" , "3xx", tostring(OriginResponseStatus) startswith "4" , "4xx", tostring(OriginResponseStatus) startswith "5" , "5xx","")
| where isnotempty(response_error_type)
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by response_error_type;
content.title: Origin Response Status Over Time
